definition: to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: You can't afford accumulated a variety of extra burden penny-wise and pound foolish.
sentences.chinese: 你付不起貪小失大所累積的種種額外負擔。
